participant_1.background:
I have a crib in my office, so I can keep an eye on my child while I work.
if i were to be reincarnated , i d want to come back as a hippopotamus.
i love going to concerts on the weekend.
i am a psychology major.
I want to write my own fairytales to share with my family and friends.

participant_2.background:
I procrastinate on my lesson plans.
I work in a fast-paced environment that encourages me to try new things and learn from my mistakes.
i live on the third floor in an apartment.
My laundry takes a backseat to my many projects.
I am not the superstitious type, but my friends are always trying to get me to go to a fortune teller.

content.text: Hello!
Hello! How are you today?
I'm doing well! What about you?
I'm doing well too. Thanks for asking!
What do you do for fun?
I like to go to concerts, play video games, and hang out with friends.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to go to concerts too. What is your favorite band?
I really like Panic! At The Disco. What about you?
I love Panic! At The Disco! They are so good. I also like Twenty One Pilots and The Killers.
Those are great bands! I have seen Twenty One Pilots in concert before. They were amazing!
I'm jealous! I've never been to a Twenty One Pilots concert. I hope I can see them one day.
I hope you get to see them soon! They are a lot of fun live.
Thanks! I'm sure it would be an amazing experience.
It definitely was!
I'm glad you had a good time.
Me too!
Do you have any other hobbies?
I also like to read, write, and watch movies.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to read and write too. What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read a variety of books, but I especially enjoy historical fiction and fantasy novels.
I love historical fiction too! I've been reading a lot of books about the American Civil War lately.
That sounds interesting! I've never read any books about the American Civil War.
You should check them out! They're really good.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! I'm happy to help.
You're welcome
